name: Chingri Malaikari
description: A traditional Bengali dish made with prawns in a coconut milk and mustard paste gravy. Served with steamed rice.

name: Hilsha Curry
description: A classic Bengali fish curry made with hilsha fish and a blend of spices. Served with steamed rice.

name: Kacchi Biryani
description: A special type of biryani made with marinated mutton, basmati rice, and a variety of spices. Served with raita and salad.

name: Luchi and Cholar Dal
description: A popular Bengali breakfast dish made with deep-fried flatbreads (luchi) and a sweet and spicy lentil stew (cholar dal).

name: Mishti Doi
description: A sweet and creamy dessert made with yogurt, jaggery, and cardamom. Served chilled.

name: Beef Bhuna
description: Beef Bhuna is a traditional Bangladeshi curry dish made with slow-cooked beef and a variety of aromatic spices.
